item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 3, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Kis.tools – A directory of tools that work (6 points | discuss)
2. Speed, scale and reliability: 25 years of Google datacenter networking evolution (118 points | 18 comments)
3. The motor turns too much (307 points | 132 comments)
4. Venvstacks: Virtual Environment Stacks for Python (19 points | 7 comments)
5. Get me out of data hell (407 points | 141 comments)
6. Ractor – a Rust Actor Framework (71 points | 27 comments)
7. Eighty Years of the Finite Element Method (2022) (161 points | 83 comments)
8. Next Generation Out of Band Garbage Collection (124 points | 64 comments)
9. Unix core utilities implemented in Haskell (18 points | discuss)
10. Weird Lexical Syntax (383 points | 186 comments)
11. Saving historic cruise ships (31 points | 35 comments)
12. Show HN: A minimalist (brutalist?) website for sharing all your links (243 points | 130 comments)
13. Spann: Highly-Efficient Billion-Scale Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search (2021) (91 points | 25 comments)
14. SpawELO – small free matchmaking system for LAN parties (146 points | 34 comments)
15. Advances in Zero-Knowledge Proofs: Bridging the Gap Between Theory and Practice [pdf] (4 points | discuss)
16. Show HN: Someday, Open-Source Calendly Alternative for Gmail / Google App Script (252 points | 43 comments)
17. The inventor of the automatic rice cooker (169 points | 144 comments)
18. Sortledton: A Universal, Transactional Graph Data Structure [pdf] (78 points | 11 comments)
19. Hacking the T2S+ Out of Fear: Get Lock-In Thermography for Free (256 points | 34 comments)
20. Repeatability: As Difficult as it is Important (25 points | 6 comments)
21. XTP: Make Squishy Software (32 points | 5 comments)
22. Prisma Postgres – Runs on bare metal and unikernels (243 points | 108 comments)
23. Boston Dynamics robot Atlas goes hands on [video] (185 points | 160 comments)
24. Cramming Solitaire onto a Nintendo E-Reader card (92 points | 38 comments)
25. Security flaws found in all Nvidia GeForce GPUs. Update drivers ASAP (144 points | 82 comments)
26. Colorado scrambles to change voting-system passwords after accidental leak (172 points | 407 comments)
27. Inspecting North Korea's Digital Map App: Licensing and API Insights (52 points | 18 comments)
28. Toyota to buy clean power from a $1.1B solar farm in Texas (49 points | 31 comments)
29. Signal: Online MIDI Editor (132 points | 20 comments)
30. Ring-Based Mid-Air Gesture Typing System Using Deep Learning Word Prediction (50 points | 30 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 3, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
